YU SHAN

Front-end Web Developer

Hello! My name is Yu Shan and I am a web developer living and working in China. I enjoy creating engaging projects which require using both the left and right sides of my brain to create a visually appealing yet functional experience. In my spare time,I'm fond of reading, listening to music and appreciating paintings.I'm good at running, too ^-^

Wish you have a nice day. ♥
